thread.title: Very good and cosy hotel just near central park
thread.title_full: Very good and cosy hotel just near central park - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: GAIART33
title: Very good and cosy hotel just near central park
text:
A very nice hotel, silent and well furnished in 76th and Madison, Uptown. Surrounded by central park, the MET, Gagosian gallery you couldn't ask more. Marble in toilets, nice linen, good beds and wonderful view in the roof top.Good the restaurant too.
Unfortunately , while I was there, they had some serious problems with the wifi and this is annoying if you have to work. It shouldnt'happen in such a hotel.
Room Tip: better top floor rooms See more room tips
